Item.name: Hydroponic Planter
Item.description: A device providing perfect conditions for europas underwater plants to grow. Yields a plant every 15 minutes. Needs power.

Item.name: Distiller
Item.description: Used to distill ethanol from sugar and sea yeast shrooms. Needs power.

Item.name: Brewing Kettle
Item.description: Used to brew kegs of almost any kind of beverage. Needs power.

Item.name: Bottle Printer
Item.description: Used to mass produce bottles. Needs power.

Item.name: Refill Station
Item.description: Used to refill empty bottles from a keg. Needs power.

Item.name: Fryer
Item.description: Used for frying stuff. Needs power.
